name: Monkey Strong - A Barrel Throwing Simulator
name_original: Monkey Strong - A Barrel Throwing Simulator
description:
Monkey Strong A Barrel Throwing Simulator

Made for Mini Jam 78: Bugs

Designed, developped, composed, and illustrated by Feather Dreams.

Limitation: You are the Bad Guy

Warning: You will see a single spike of lag early into the game. I was unable to resolve this bug in the time given.
